name: Cafe Delivery
description:
Game Jam submission for the :

Weekly Game Jam - Week 159

This weeks theme was cafe and what we decided with this idea was to create a car game where you have to destroy other cafes and make it to the end of the level!

Your trusty truck

We all know that where in a lock down, and that means that the cafe's need to be closed. So what how else are you going to stop them than ramming right through them?

A house about to get rammed

This game was made in 7 days so do expect to find some bugs :0

This game was made by 2 people, me and a good friend of mine Crash and we both hope that you enjoy Enjoy the game

All music used in the game was made by mafuwafu and you can find his sound cloud here : https://soundcloud.com/mafuwafu

You can find Crash here at his website: crashgamestudios.com

If you want to see more from me you can find me on my Youtube channel or check out my other games on itch: www.youtube.com/channel/UCCiCemiXw5bB22E1oF8aVkA
